Package com.sicomsa.dmt

Class RealCredentials

java.lang.Object
com.sicomsa.dmt.RealCredentials
All Implemented Interfaces:
Credentials
public class RealCredentials extends Object implements Credentials
This class is an implementation of Credentials that uses a private key in order to implement the sign method.
Since:
1.0
Version:
2024-9-28
Author:
Beto Lopez

  • Constructor Details

    • RealCredentials

      protected RealCredentials()
      Protected constructor without parameters

    • RealCredentials

      public RealCredentials(String rfc, X509Certificate certificate, PrivateKey privateKey)
      Returns an instance of RealCredentials that will use the received rfc, certificate, and privateKey to implement Credentials. This constructor will upper cast the parameter rfc.
      Parameters:
      rfc - the RFC of the contributor owner of this credentials
      certificate - the X509Certificate of the contributor owner of this credentials
      privateKey - the PrivateKey of the contributor owner of this credentials
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if rfc, certificate or privateKey are null.

    • sign

      public void sign(XMLSignature signature, jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPElement element)
      Description copied from interface: Credentials
      Uses signature to sign the element received using this credentials.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
